Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

...If you go around the forum as it is today, and take a look at the KSP fan Work threads (or the equivalent in any other forum with such a section), and see how many new posts are, well, posted every day. You small Youtubers out there, feel the pain? Everyday, people post stuff there all the time, over congestion is a huge problem. Whether deserving the attention or not, so many people (OK, i succumb to it as well, I must suck at this youtube thing, get my point?). And all those bigger youtube-ing entities "hog" all the views, either on the forum, or in the *X_X* Must-Not-Be-Named-World-of-YouTube, right?

So, y'know the saying "There's strength in numbers."? I thought that would apply to this problem, so, we could post all our videos here and support one another, and while viewers come to this thread, they'll look through this and get to browse what videos are posted here.

So, just post your comedy videos here, in a semi-formal manner, (as in, don't use that "begging" attitude that some may use. Sorry for my rudeness...). Just post the best of your "crop" here, videos you think that should be put here.

I know Danny2462 is pulling attention away from your stuff. I think I know the success to his secret, he thinks his videos over a long time and makes sure they're as professional yet funny at the same time, and adds his professional touch, which everyone really likes!

So, to get us started, here is my best comedy video:

What funny things do you guys have in store? Let me know, post your stuff in a semi-professional manner, and take a look at all the posts here! Don't forget to look closely at those YouTube Giants for ideas and tips for yourself!
